title: 以后MC还会用java开发吗？
author: 夏衣
txt_content:
个人感觉java版就是一个坑
吃内存
性能不怎么样
而且也不是为游戏设计的平台

replies.author: 吊打小逗比
replies.txt_content: 基岩引擎XD

replies.author: 假的混.乱
replies.txt_content: 我感觉还好...Java版肯定还会在的XD

replies.author: Blank°
replies.txt_content: 毕竟Minecraft是Java引擎，以后可能会一直是用Java开发

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content: 没办法，notch学了Java

replies.author: 风扇滑翔翼
replies.txt_content:
小阿狸.... 发表于 2017-8-2 17:03
没办法，notch学了Java
为什么不学c艹呢（滑稽）

replies.author: 咯咯哒37
replies.txt_content: 一定的啊，不用说的事

replies.author: hunterincave
replies.txt_content:
Java版很长一段时间内都不会消失的
（话说小阿狸怎么退休了....）

replies.author: PopcornBOOM
replies.txt_content: 对台式机来说还行
我觉得java还可以

replies.author: The_infinite
replies.txt_content: java不错啊 为什么觉得是个坑

replies.author: Gu_Jia
replies.txt_content: 肯定还是JAVA      不用想

replies.author: Gu_Jia
replies.txt_content: 肯定还会用JAVA的

replies.txt_content:
小阿狸.... 发表于 2017-8-2 17:03
没办法，notch学了Java
明明就是用C++开发的...

replies.author: qq2888814
replies.txt_content: 不用java用什么？我还真想不到。。要做成网游吗？

replies.author: LOL_xz
replies.txt_content: 当然是选择Java垃

replies.author: DefineEvil
replies.txt_content: 短期内肯定不会放弃，未来有可能转到C++或C#

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content:
WO! 发表于 2017-8-2 19:12
明明就是用C++开发的...

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content: 以后可能会停更java版，，毕竟，，java嘛

replies.author: TNT嘉音
replies.txt_content: 会的，java版本很简单。

replies.author: 小安゜
replies.txt_content: 未来将出现C++还是C#的我的世界呢?我记得在哪里看过的。。

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content: 如果扔掉PC版……的确不会用了

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 而且不是高中微机课讲的内容
